azurerm_network_interface_application_se.description: Manages the association between a Network Interface and a Application Security Group

network_interface_id.description: The ID of the Network Interface. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

application_security_group_id.description: The ID of the Application Security Group which this Network Interface which should be connected to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The (Terraform specific) ID of the Association between the Network Interface and the Application Security Group.

create.description: Used when creating the association between the Network Interface and the Application Security Group.

update.description: Used when updating the association between the Network Interface and the Application Security Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the association between the Network Interface and the Application Security Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the association between the Network Interface and the Application Security Group.
